abilities.name: Coordinated Leadership
abilities.rule: At the end of your Command phase, roll one D6: on a 4+, you gain 1CP.

abilities.name: Failure Is Not an Option
abilities.rule: While this model is leading a unit, models in that unit have the Feel No Pain 5+ ability.

wargear_options: ■ This model can be equipped with 1 hover drone.

■ This model can be equipped with up to two of the following, and can take duplicates:
◦ 1 gun drone
◦ 1 marker drone
◦ 1 shield drone
